desc: This five-foot long ardite greatsword has a narrow blade and a hilt of wrought iron wrapped in grey leather. The blade is warm to the touch and shimmers with brilliant red and orange hues.
This silver-engraved shortsword is as light as a feather with an edge honed to perfection.
The rounded head of this flail is perforated with tiny holes, arranged in symbols and patterns.
This six-foot long greatsword has a wide blade and a hilt in the shape of an upward 'V'. Embellished with runic inscriptions, the white blade shimmers like gold in the sunlight.
This fist-sized sapphire vibrates and hums with positive psionic charge.
